title: Customized Language Teaching Method Design Based on Mathematics Learning Behavior Patterns

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and possession of general language proficiency
context.additional_context: Analysis of mathematical learning behavior types to strengthen language learning motivation and develop personalized strategies.

learning_goals: Learners can identify six types of mathematical learning behavior patterns (motivated, rebellious, despairing, vulnerable, avoidant, and rejecting) and apply them to language learning.
Learners can diagnose their own mathematical learning behavior patterns and develop language learning strategies based on them.
Learners can design and implement personalized language learning activities to foster motivation and build success expectations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
